review.title: “My experience working with Jking & Sons is engaging”
review.pros: Pros – At Jking & Sons you get to prove your worth as long as you are resilient & true to your work.
review.cons: Cons – Corporate standards such as training & development, commendations for good performances, and merit increases have to be clearly layed out and implemented.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Set an annual budget for developing the skills of the ranks and management personnel and back it up with individual performance bonuses
